name: astonish
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.
